alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 12 at 2:22AM CDT until April 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ this morning to 1 PM CDT /noon MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Reduced visibility in blowing dust.
info.instruction: Light low flying aircraft should not fly near the mountains due to the likelihood of severe turbulence.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
